nodes.text: R2-D2's tales from the Data Banks

R2-D2's tales from the Data Banks is a two-comic collection released by Marvel UK in 1985's Return of the Jedi Weekly 83 and Star Wars Summer Special 1985. Incredibly obscure, the comics in question, despite sporting a Star Wars heading, had absolutely no relation to Star Wars or its universe. The stories had originally appeared in Marvel Comics' Tales to Astonish in 1963.
